item.title: Seeking help
item.description: If you happen to run into a use-case that hit does not yet support or happen to have trouble in using hit, please reach out to us. We will be happy to assist you! Finding help # If you run into a cryptic error or have trouble using hit, please open a Github issue on the hbagdi/hit repository. Reporting bugs # To report bugs, please open a Github issue on the hbagdi/hit repository.
